roleset.name: natural disaster: tornado

role.descr: whirling element; mention of wind or fire

example.name: twister-n: arg6
example.text: A fire rages in Moore, Okla., after the two-mile-wide twister flattened the town.

example.name: twister-n: arg1
example.text: That F5 twister?which brought with it winds that topped 300 miles per hour, the most powerful ever recorded?killed three dozen people and did an estimated $1 billion worth of damage.
example.arg: twister?which brought with it winds that topped 300 miles per hour,

example.name: twister-n: argM-EXTs, arg1
example.text: frightening 30 meter high fire twister caught on tape

roleset.note: TWISTER-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to tornado, whirl (from twister.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
